title: The Sorcerer's apprentice
creator_credit: Edward English, Morton Schindel and Weston Woods Studios
brief_description: Tells the story of the Sorcerer’s apprentice with drawings by Lisl Weil. Music by Paul Dukas. From the book by Lisl Weil.
